text: The Alzheimer Case (also called The Alzheimer Affair or The Memory of a Killer) is a 2003 movie directed by Erik Van Looy. It is based on the novel De Zaak Alzheimer by Jef Geeraerts. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2003 drama movies Category:2003 action movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Belgian action movies Category:Movies based on books
title: The Alzheimer Case
